author: hsiaowei
content:
Consensus layer specs v1.5.0-alpha.2-- Electivire -- released! 

https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.5.0-alpha.2

Test vectors: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-spec-tests/releases/tag/v1.5.0-alpha.2

For Electra, it's non-substantive and only includes the test case fixes.

For EIP-7594 (PeerDAS), it includes some essential fixes for the initial interop.
